name: Cake Shop
description: A website built for a cake shop to display their confectionary and allow customers make orders

name: TV Show App
description: A dynamic website displaying information about TV shows that also allows users to like and comment on tv series..
content1: A dynamic website displaying information about TV shows.

name: Space Travelers Hub
description: A web application that fetches data from SpaceX API and display rocket, mission and dragon details.

name: Pet Shop
description: A website for a petcare shop that allows clients read about the shop, blogs, find services and make appointments
content1: In this project you can book services, as well as shop for pet products

name: Budget Buddy
description: A web application to create categories, and track expenses for each category.

name: House Haven
description: A web application to add, delete and reserve houses.
